    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Heartripper Blade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1730)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Crown of the Kobold King</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 115

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wicked-looking curved weapon is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ that draws power from defeating foes, either to bolster itself or its wielder. A _heartripper blade_ is well suited for use in any ritual that involves divination, and incorporating it into any ritual with the [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) trait grants the wielder a +1 item bonus on any check made to resolve the effects of the ritual's casting.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You reduce a foe to 0 Hit Points with a Strike from the _heartripper blade_;  **Effect** The _heartripper blade_ draws power from the devastating strike, causing its blade to erupt in black flames. For 1 minute, Strikes with the _heartripper blade_ inflict an additional 1d6 negative damage to living creatures.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You reduce a foe to 0 Hit Points with a Strike from the _heartripper blade_;  **Effect** The _heartripper blade_ draws life from the victim's body and siphons it into you. Choose one of the following effects: restore 2d8 Hit Points; reduce the value of your [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) conditions by 1; or reduce the stage of one toxin or [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) you're suffering by one stage (this can't reduce the stage below stage 1 or cure the affliction).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
